title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.9 - Appointments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.9 - Appointments

State Regulations

The commissioner shall appoint all officers and employees of
the department. Appointments to the positions of deputy commissioner, associate
commissioner, assistant commissioner and director of the Office of Professional

Discipline shall be made with approval of the Board of

Regents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
3.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
